file_summary: This document contains the full text of the Apache License, Version 2.0, released in January 2004. It is a permissive free software license that allows users to freely use, modify, and distribute software under its terms, even for commercial purposes. The license defines key terms like 'Work', 'Derivative Works', 'Contributor', and 'License', and outlines the conditions for redistribution, including requirements to retain copyright notices and provide a copy of the license. It explicitly grants both copyright and patent licenses, disclaims warranties on an 'AS IS' basis, and limits liability. The appendix also provides instructions on how to apply this license to one's own work.
